text:
Now, shall we get going?
Is everyone ready──

Oh, sorry! Kaho just realized she forgot
something back in the school building...

Starting nowー, I'd like to shareー,
everyone's good points!

Natsuha-san isー!　Someone we can rely on!
I also want to be like Natsuha-san!

Rinze-san neverー gets flustered! Even during
scary challengesー, she leads the way and stays calm!

Juri-chan isー! Incredibly, incredibly kind! She always thinks
about othersー, even me, so I feel reassured thanks to Juri-chan!
Thanks to Juri-chan, I feel empowered!

Choco-senpai isー......
Eating a lot of food!

Eating with Choco-senpai is fun, and
the meals Choco-senpai teaches us to make are delicious!

Being with Choco-senpai
makes me feel warm and happy!

I love everyoneー!
I love HO-KA-GO CLIMAX GIRLSー!

From all of usー!
We have something to say to Kahoー!
